messages.subject: Jo!!!!!!!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi! I´m a Shinsengumi fan from Brazil!! Actually I don´t know much thing about the manga.... I watch the NHK taiga. Just it! I loved Jo new pics!!! Jo---2
messages.messageBody:
Hi! I´m a Shinsengumi fan from Brazil!! Actually I don´t know much
thing about the manga.... I watch the NHK taiga. Just it!
I loved Jo new pics!!!"Jo---2" (looks like a magazine) is my fave!!!
How charming and mysterious he looks.... oh god!!! And his
voice.... :) I like Shingo, Kouji, Tanihara, Tatsuya..... all these
guys are really good actors and so handsome (perfect combination!)


..::Yuka::..
